answers.answer: Check for Celiac disease.  Not all Celiacs lose weight; some gain.  Maybe you are reacting to other foods, like dairy.  Stopping problem foods can be the key to issues like this.  Also get checked for thyroid disease and diabetes.

question: I have always digested food withing several hours and did not know this was abnormal until recently. I'm 23 years old and am wondering if this could have anything to do with my constant weight gain. I eat all the right foods and exercise, but have never dropped weight, only gained. Any ideas?
title: Digesting too fast?
